    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Calculator
    The Calculator class provides a method to calculate shipping costs based on the dimensions and weight of a packet
    CalculatorArea
    The CalculatorArea class provides a graphical user interface for calculating shipping costs based on the dimensions and weight of a package.
    ExplorerArea
    The ExplorerArea class provides a GUI component for displaying a file system structure within a tab.
    Helper
    The Helper class provides utility methods to support various tasks across the application.
    InspectorArea
    The InspectorArea class provides a dedicated area within the user interface for viewing and editing details of selected items.
    MessagesArea
    The MessagesArea class provides a user interface component for displaying a series of messages or log entries.
    PackageCalculator
    The PackageCalculator class serves as the main entry point for the application.
    Packet
    The Packet class represents a package with specific dimensions (length and height) and weight
    ProjectHandling
    The ProjectHandling class provides methods to handle project operations such as opening projects and creating new files.
    StatusArea
    The StatusArea class is a user interface component designed to display the current status of the application.
    ToolbarArea
    The ToolbarArea class represents the toolbar of the application, containing various buttons that allow the user to perform key actions such as opening projects, creating new files, saving files, accessing settings, and getting info.
